p: The National Health Commission of China reported that often the first contact of patients with doctors is with reported palpitations or chest pain rather than respiratory symptoms. Only later are they diagnosed as positive for Covid-19 [ 6]. Some Covid-19 patients have high sensitivity cardiac troponin 1 levels, suggesting myocardial injury [ 6]. 26% of patients hospitalised at Zhongnan University Hospital of Wuhan required cardiovascular intensive care. Of these, 16.7% developed arrhythmias and 7.2% and acute coronary syndrome [ 3].
